name: Way Back To Earth - 2D Platformer
description:
Welcome! This is my 2D Platformer Project Way Back to Earth.

Modifications:

1. Added new types of Enemies such as Static Enemies and Waypoint Enemies

2. Made the game more complicated and difficult so that the players would need to plan their routines.

3. Added a function that allow the player to shoot the enemies with his new Alien Weapon! (this function includes new scripts on both the player and the enemies)

4. Made an entirely different 2nd Level which is even more challenging and requires the player to use the shooting weapon.

Tips for beating the game:

1st Level: You need to find the grey key on the very right to unlock the door to the goal.

2nd Level: You need to use your shooting weapon to kill to static enemies in order to reach the grey key and continue.

Created by Joseph Su
